short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT OF TECHNICAL ENGINEERING AND MAINTENANCE SERVICES
description: This technical consulting service is for the project
full_summary:
## Senior Engineering Graduate - Notice of Proposed Procurement

### Proposal Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the services of one (1) Senior Engineering Graduate, as part of its Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) requirement.

### Background

This requirement is part of the Task and Solutions Based Professional Services (TSPS) framework, which is a result of a formal competitive process established after extensive consultations with industry. The TSPS framework aims to provide an on-going opportunity for suppliers to become pre-qualified for participation in future bidding opportunities.

### Requirement Details

* Un (1) ingénieur (diplômé en génie) Senior
* The contractor resource will provide project management, engineering, and maintenance services in support of the CC130H weapon system.
* The position will assist with change management, organizational design, financial management, and associated administrative tasks relating to the OWSM contracts supporting the CC130H Hercules.
* Estimated level of effort: 240 days per year for a resource.
* Estimated contract duration: 24 April 2023 to 30 April 2026, with two (2) one-year irrevocable option periods.

### Pre-Qualified Suppliers

This RFP is open to a list of pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS framework. The list of eligible suppliers can be found on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

### Tender Documents

The RFP documents will be emailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers by the DND Point of Contact. Bidders are advised that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

### Contact Information

For any enquiries regarding this RFP, please contact:

* Chantal Leavoy, DND POC
* Email: chantal.leavoy@forces.gc.ca
* File Number: W8485-TSPS2023-20

### Note

All enquiries must be submitted to the DND POC listed above. RFP documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Closing Date

The tender closing date is 18 April 2023 at 14:00:00. Late submissions will not be accepted. Award of the contract is anticipated to be made shortly after the closing date. this information will be also available in the Goverment Bulleting website.

Please Address all inquiries following dates mentioned above.
I will be very grateful if you could fulfill the request. This text will
